channel.title: DivineDescent 718 | Hi-Scores | Vote4Reward | Auto-Donation | Daily Updates | Be
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JhqeHgL.png[/img]
[SIZE=5]DOUBLE XP IS ACTIVATED[/SIZE]
Here at Divine Descent, we take every little detail into thought. As you look through the media and the list of things this server has to offer, you will see all the hard work we have put in to make your experience the best it can be.
[URL=http://www.divinedescent.org/Webclient.html][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4LC7mh7.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/mo51gqfafcy13kc/DivineDescent.jar][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PYpkZeP.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.divinedescent.org][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d7wwGaQ.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=4]VPS Specs[/SIZE]:
6.20Ghz Processor 8192MB Ram 1000GB HD Bandwidth: Unmetered (unlimited) [SIZE=1][Will be updated as population grows][/SIZE]
Features: - All Godwars Bosses - All Godwars prayer altars - All Skills Working [Literally ALL] - Slayer tasks - Slayer shop with customize your own slayer helmet interface - All Altars (Curses, Ancients, Lunar Spells) - Fight Caves - JAD - Fight Kiln - Barrows - Glacors - Ganodermic Beasts - Clan Wars - Nomad - ALL load stones work to teleport around DivineDescent - Nex with ALL stages 100% working - Bork - New and Old item looks ::switchitemslook is command - Runespan 100% - Queen & King Black Dragon - Perfect Combat (Melee, Magic, and Range)
Many more just have to log onto the [URL=http://"http://www.divinedescent.org"]server[/URL] to check it out!

Here at Divine Descent, we take every little detail into thought. As you look through the media and the list of things this server has to offer, you will see all the hard work we have put in to make your experience the best it can be.

1000GB HD
